duties_responsibilities.duty: Rounding and managing clinical care of patients at the assigned SNF.
Providing high-quality patient-centered comprehensive primary care services to patients residing in SNFs.
Administering and prescribing medications and treatments for residents at SNFs.
Documenting patient care/encounters in the facility's EHR systems.
Participating in phone/secure messaging consultations with facility nursing staff.
Completing documentation in Theoria’s proprietary EHR system and other facility EHR systems.

education_certification.credential: NP License from an accredited institution
